verses.verse: O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, return <S%H7725><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>; for thou hast fallen <S%H3782><s%> by thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> with you words <S%H1697><s%>, and return <S%H7725><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5375><s%>, Take away all iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and accept <S%H3947><s%> that which is good <S%H2896><s%>: so will we render <S%H7999><s%> as bullocks <S%H6499><s%> the offering of our lips <S%H8193><s%>.

Assyria <S%H804><s%> shall not save <S%H3467><s%> us <S%H7392><s%>; we will not ride upon horses <S%H5483><s%>; neither will we say <S%H559><s%> any more to the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands <S%H3027><s%>, Ye are our gods <S%H430><s%>; for in thee the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> findeth mercy <S%H7355><s%>.
I will heal <S%H7495><s%> their backsliding <S%H4878><s%>, I will love <S%H157><s%> them freely <S%H5071><s%>; for mine anger <S%H639><s%> is turned away from him <S%H7725><s%>.
I will be as the dew <S%H2919><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%>; he shall blossom <S%H6524><s%> as the lily <S%H7799><s%>, and cast forth <S%H5221><s%> his roots <S%H8328><s%> as Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.
His branches <S%H3127><s%> shall spread <S%H3212><s%>, and his beauty <S%H1935><s%> shall be as the olive-tree <S%H2132><s%>, and his smell <S%H7381><s%> as Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.

They that dwell <S%H3427><s%> under his shadow <S%H6738><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%>; they shall revive <S%H2421><s%> as the grain <S%H1715><s%>, and blossom <S%H6524><s%> as the vine <S%H1612><s%>: the scent <S%H2143><s%> thereof shall be as the wine <S%H3196><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall say <S%H6091><s%>, What have I to do any more with idols? I have answered <S%H6030><s%>, and will regard <S%H7789><s%> him <S%H7488><s%>: I am like a green fir-tree <S%H1265><s%>; from me is thy fruit <S%H6529><s%> found <S%H4672><s%>.

Who is wise <S%H2450><s%>, that he may understand <S%H995><s%> these things <S%H995><s%>? prudent, that he may know <S%H3045><s%> them <S%H1870><s%>? for the ways of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> are right <S%H3477><s%>, and the just <S%H6662><s%> shall walk <S%H3212><s%> in them <S%H6586><s%>; but transgressors shall fall therein <S%H3782><s%>.
